Steve Jobs (Walter Isaacson)
- Your Highlight on page 257 | location 3373-3375 | Added on Monday, 7 July 2025 22:57:42

There were times when he wanted to assert himself as a corporate manager, even writing a memo urging cost savings by eliminating free beverages and first-class air travel, and other times when he agreed with those who were encouraging him to go off and run a new AppleLabs R&D group.
